articles.title: U.S. officials say 21 people on cruise ship have tested positive for coronavirus - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: The Grand Princess cruise cut short a 15-day trip between California and Hawaii after passengers began complaining of flu-like symptoms
articles.content:
Marie Elise Marino and husband Gilles Gervias travelled with her brother and sister-in-law on the previous cruise to Mexico in February.
Handout

articles.title: Tim Hortons cancels the paper cup portion of Roll Up the Rim amid coronavirus fears
articles.description: News comes just a day after the chain confirmed it had cancelled a plan to give away 1.8-million reusable cups as part of a plan to give the contest a more environmentally-friendly focus
articles.content:
Signage for Tim Hortons' Roll Up the Rim contest is seen inside a Tim Hortons restaurant in Toronto, Friday, March 6, 2020. 
Cole Burston/The Canadian Press
